title: 199. Andrew McDonald and Ben Wood: The Real Pigeons with Dani Vee and Adrian Beck
itunes:author: Words and Nerds: Authors, books and literature.
itunes:summary:
Ever wonder why pigeons always act so weird?
It’s because they’re out there chasing the bad guys and saving your butts! On Episode 199, Andrew McDonald and Ben Wood share their love of pigeons, true collaboration, baking in ISO and we talk about the weirdest thing we've ever eaten. Join hosts Dani Vee and Adrian Beck.
itunes:subtitle:
Ever wonder why pigeons always act so weird?
It’s…
description:
Ever wonder why pigeons always act so weird?
It’s because they’re out there chasing the bad guys and saving your butts! On Episode 199, Andrew McDonald and Ben Wood share their love of pigeons, true collaboration, baking in ISO and we talk about the weirdest thing we've ever eaten. Join hosts Dani Vee and Adrian Beck.
